module_restrictions: Graduate courses are offered to senior year undergraduate students who have completed at least two and a half years of study at their undergraduate study.
visa_info: Upon acceptance, Tokyo Tech will apply for a Certificate of Eligibility on your behalf with the Japanese Ministry of Justice, and send it to you when issued. The certificate is required for you to apply for a study visa.

university_accommodation: Shofu Ryugakusei Kaikan (about 15 minutes’ walk from Aobadai station in Kanagawa prefecture)
Umegaoka Ryugakusei Kaikan (about 20 minutes’ walk from Fujigaoka station in Kanagawa prefecture)
accommodations_info.private_accommodation: The COOP service at Tokyo Tech will assist students to search for a private apartment after enrollment at Tokyo Tech. Useful information will be obtainable at the COOP office.

university_description: Tokyo Institute of Technology is a national research university located in Greater Tokyo Area, Japan. Tokyo Tech is the largest institution for higher education in Japan dedicated to science and technology, featuring a prominent international presence among universities focused on science and technology.
